metadata.Title: CVE-2022-2867 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: libtiff's tiffcrop utility has a uint32_t underflow that can lead to out of bounds read and write. An attacker who supplies a crafted file to tiffcrop (likely via tricking a user to run tiffcrop on it with certain parameters) could cause a crash or in some cases, further exploitation.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> fix is the same commit as in CVE-2022-2868, CVE-2022-2869

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
